name: Bribery-Free Business Zone
title: Lowest Bribery Incidence Among Firms
description: In 2019, only 0.2% of firms in Cyprus reported experiencing a bribe payment request, showcasing the country's strong stance against corruption.

name: Education Champions
title: Top Female Persistence to Primary Education
description: In 2021, Cyprus achieved a 100% persistence rate for females reaching the last grade of primary education, highlighting its commitment to female education.

name: Poverty Virtually Eliminated
title: Lowest Poverty Headcount Ratio
description: As of 2021, only 0.1% of Cyprus's population lived below the $8.30 a day poverty line, reflecting the country's economic stability and effective social policies.
